FuncDef: The display bgp evpn routing-table command displays information about BGP EVPN routes. The display bgp evpn routing-table command displays information about BGP EVPN routes. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display bgp evpn all routing-table { ad-route | es-route | inclusive-route | mac-route | prefix-route } <prefix> { community-list | ext-community | large-community | cluster-list | advertised-peer | as-path }

display bgp [ instance <instance-name> ] evpnallrouting-table { ad-route | es-route | inclusive-route | mac-route | prefix-route } <prefix> { community-list | ext-community | large-community | cluster-list | advertised-peer | as-path }

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about all Ethernet auto-discovery routes.
-

Displays information about Ethernet segment routes.
-

Displays information about inclusive multicast routes.
-

Displays information about MAC advertisement routes.
-

Specifies the prefix of an EVPN route.
An EVPN route prefix has the following formats:
IP prefix route. The value is in the format of L:X.X.X.X:M or L:[X:X::X:X]:M, where:
L is fixed at 0.X.X.X.X indicates the host IP address.M indicates the mask length of the host IP address.X:X::X:X indicates the IPv6 host address.

Displays the community list of BGP EVPN routes.
-

Displays the extended community list of BGP EVPN routes.
-

Displays the extended community attribute of BGP EVPN routes.
-

Displays the cluster list of BGP EVPN routes.
-

Displays the advertised peer list of BGP EVPN routes.
-

Displays the AS_Path attribute of BGP EVPN routes.
-

Displays information about EVPN routes of all EVPN instances.
-

Displays information about EVPN routes of a specified BGP instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. If spaces are used, the string must be enclosed in double quotation marks (" ").

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp evpn all routing-table inclusive-route 0:32:10.5.5.5 large-community
